statements: DELETE FROM citations_and_references WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM citations_and_references WHERE author_name = 'John Doe' AND publication_date < '2020-01-01';
DELETE FROM citations_and_references WHERE publication_date >= '2020-01-01' AND publication_date <= '2021-12-31';
DELETE FROM citations WHERE id = 1 AND paper_id = 10;
DELETE FROM citations WHERE id IN (SELECT id FROM references WHERE reference_text LIKE '%important%');
DELETE FROM references WHERE reference_id IN (SELECT reference_id FROM references WHERE paper_id = 1);
DELETE FROM References WHERE cited_paper_title = 'Some Paper Title';
DELETE FROM Authors WHERE affiliation = 'Some Affiliation';
DELETE FROM citations WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM references WHERE cited_paper_id IN (SELECT paper_id FROM papers WHERE publication_date < '2020-01-01');
DELETE FROM authors WHERE affiliation = 'University College London';
